metadata.title: Catalogo Completo Studi Plimsoll
metadata.description: Database completo di 7.895 settori industriali elaborati dai file CSV originali
metadata.source: File CSV Plimsoll (REPSIT, REPSUK, REPSFR, REPSSP, REPSPW)

sectors.name: Concessionarie AUDI
sectors.description: Concessionarie autorizzate per la vendita di autoveicoli Audi nuovi e usati, con servizi completi di assistenza post-vendita, finanziamento e ricambi originali.
sectors.keywords: audi, concessionarie, automotive, automobili, vendita, assistenza

sectors.name: Autofficine
sectors.description: Officine meccaniche specializzate nella riparazione, manutenzione e assistenza tecnica di autoveicoli con servizi di diagnosi computerizzata e sostituzione ricambi.

sectors.name: Consulenza Aziendale
sectors.description: Società di consulenza che forniscono servizi specializzati di advisory strategico, supporto operativo e consulenza gestionale alle imprese.

sectors.name: Software Development Companies
sectors.description: Companies specialising in software development, digital solutions and IT consulting services for businesses across various industries.
sectors.keywords: software, development, IT, digital, technology, consulting

sectors.name: Telecommunications Services
sectors.description: Telecommunications companies providing mobile, fixed-line and internet services to residential and business customers.

sectors.name: Financial Advisory Services
sectors.description: Financial services companies providing investment advice, portfolio management and financial planning services to individuals and businesses.

sectors.name: Abattage d'Animaux de Boucherie
sectors.description: Entreprises spécialisées dans l'abattage et la transformation de produits carnés avec respect des normes sanitaires strictes et traçabilité complète.

sectors.name: Hôtellerie et Restauration
sectors.description: Établissements hôteliers et de restauration offrant des services d'hébergement et de restauration de qualité avec standards internationaux.

sectors.name: Services de Transport
sectors.description: Entreprises de transport routier de marchandises proposant des solutions logistiques intégrées et services de distribution.

sectors.name: Construcción de Edificios
sectors.description: Empresas de construcción especializadas en edificación residencial y comercial con servicios completos de desarrollo inmobiliario.

sectors.name: Servicios de Transporte y Logística
sectors.description: Empresas de transporte y logística que proporcionan servicios integrados de movimiento de mercancías y soluciones de supply chain.
sectors.keywords: transporte, logística, mercancías, supply chain, distribución

sectors.name: Consultoría Empresarial
sectors.description: Consultoras especializadas en asesoramiento estratégico, optimización de procesos y transformación digital para empresas.

sectors.name: Global Manufacturing Industries
sectors.description: International manufacturing companies specializing in industrial production and global supply chain management with worldwide operations.
sectors.keywords: manufacturing, industrial, production, global, supply chain

sectors.name: International Trading Companies
sectors.description: Global trading companies facilitating international commerce and distribution across multiple markets with comprehensive import/export services.
sectors.keywords: trading, international, commerce, distribution, export, import

sectors.name: Multinational Technology Services
sectors.description: Global technology companies providing enterprise software solutions, cloud services and digital transformation consulting worldwide.
sectors.keywords: technology, software, cloud, digital, enterprise, multinational

clientInstructions.loadingStrategy: Carica prima 15 settori, poi on-demand durante ricerca
clientInstructions.searchBehavior: Ricerca real-time con debounce 300ms, fuzzy search abilitato
clientInstructions.caching: Cache locale con IndexedDB, max 1 ora
clientInstructions.fallback: Se JSON non disponibile, usa dati embedded nel HTML
clientInstructions.csvSupport: Per caricamento CSV utente, usa File API + Papa Parse
clientInstructions.performance: Lazy loading, virtual scrolling per grandi dataset
